DataElement.preferredName: Patient Peripheral Blood Submission Eligibility Determination Yes No Unknown
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication as to whether a peripheral blood sample was submitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Peripheral Blood Submission Procedure Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._On or near an edge or constituting an outer boundary; the outer area._A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something._Any stepwise set of actions._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Peripheral Blood Submission Procedure Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: On or near an edge or constituting an outer boundary; the outer area.:A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.:The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.:Any stepwise set of actions.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: On or near an edge or constituting an outer boundary; the outer area.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.
